alert.note: Alert for Carson; Hutchinson; Moore; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 2:46PM CDT until June 30 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southern Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 246 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Fritch, or 13 miles southwest of Borger, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Borger, Fritch, Stinnett, Sanford and Lake Meredith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
